game_description: Enjoy various VR videos delivered from all over the world every day! With this app, you can watch high qualified VR movies made by Blinky and 360-degree cameras. DISCOVER NEW VR CONTENT - Find brand new VR content on Content tab. ADD FAVORITE - Make a list that saves your favorite videos. SUBSCRIBE TO CHANNELS - There are various channels about NEWS, 360° factory tour, LIVE Concert, and more. - Press Channel Subscribe on the channel detail if you want to watch its content. If you have any issues, let us know at support@blinky.jp
Genres: , Media Player, Music Video, News & Information
review_1: Writing Chinese. Not much content. Deleted
